name: Alabroza, Bloodfiend
description: Alabroza is a small fiendish creature with bird-like features, embodying hunger and deceit. It has a beak capable of piercing attacks and carries a sinister aura.
memorable: Alabroza's ability to charm and attach to its victims, inflicting continuous blood loss makes it a unique and formidable foe.
goals: To consume blood, enforce its will on others through charm, and manipulate situations to its advantage.
relations: Often serves other evil creatures and can be encountered alongside other fiends.
environment: Commonly found in dark places where it can prey on unsuspecting victims.
strengths: Possesses impressive mobility and magical abilities, as well as a unique method of dealing continuous damage while attached to its prey.
weaknesses: Dependency on fresh blood; failure to feed results in exhaustion, limiting its combat effectiveness.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of physical attacks with its beak and talons, alongside the charm of its hypnotic gaze.
most_powerful_ability: Hypnotic Gaze, which incapacitates and charms targets, rendering them unable to detach the Bloodfiend.
senses: Alabroza has a passive Perception of 15, making it aware of its surroundings.
skills: Skilled in perception, enhancing its ability to detect prey.
additional_information: Relies on drinking blood for sustenance.
Can change shape into a humanoid or mist, providing strategic evasion options.
Resists cold, fire, lightning, and poison damage.
Immune to charm effects, making it a formidable manipulator.
Uses spells like Minor Illusion and Suggestion to control the battlefield and deceive opponents.
spellcasting: At will: Minor Illusion; 3/day each: Detect Thoughts, Suggestion.
